channel.title: Login
channel.description:
how do i make it to were you can only login on one account only one time at same time
cus this guy is on my server i cant ip him or ban him (proxy) and he logs in with same SAME name as me and my mods i know you can put a space in front but he is not doing any of that he is using the same name as us cus my mod dident know (cus the guy was on the same name as my mod) so my mod banned him, it banned my mod and the hacker guy

item.title: Login
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote=“Tico135, post:5, topic:162501”]It would be in the Client. It would have to be like so:

[code]
if (ip is already connected, etc.)

else {

sendMessage(“To many connections from your ip”);

disconnect = true;[/code]

Something like that. You should be able to do it yourself, with ease.[/quote]
This really helps lol… -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Login
item.dc:creator: @xXx_JAVA_OWNZ_U_xXx xXx JAVA OWNZ U xXx
item.description:
@xXx_JAVA_OWNZ_U_xXx wrote:

ok but but thats not what i meant, but were whould i put that?

Read full topic

item.title: Login
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

It would be in the Client. It would have to be like so:

[code]
if (ip is already connected, etc.)

else {

sendMessage(“To many connections from your ip”);

disconnect = true;[/code]

Something like that. You should be able to do it yourself, with ease.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“xXx JAVA OWNZ U xXx, post:3, topic:162501”]well how do i make a client lol? i know a little about client like how to change the bg and gameframe lol any one got a tut on making a client with that thing to stop that?[/quote]Try looking in the Client Hacking section lol…

Read full topic

item.title: Login
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

You would have to make your own client and program somthing into it, not onto the server… unless you want them to log in then log out really fast I don’t know how to do that but I think it’s possible…

Read full topic
